name: Fear The Unknown: Dave Story
storyline:
Fear The Unknown : Dave Story
The first episode tells the story of an ordinary working-class guy who was sent to work in a remote location, deep and far from civilization. He was incredibly lucky—his story reached us. Pay attention to the small details, as they may help you survive. This is just the beginning.
summary:
In the first episode of Fear the unknown ,In the game, you will play as one of the lucky ones who met them and survived.

This game offers a first-person narrative experience, blending walking simulation with elements of exploration, driving, drinking, and interactive conversations.
